Articles.Content: the game crash without any log or crash report this is just stupid i do not know what to say please some on help me

Just now, Ninadragonborn said:

the game crash without any log or crash report this is just stupid i do not know what to say please some on help me

Log is allways there. There doesn't need to be a crash log. Just search for your ksp.log file in your root directory, and somebody may help you. Bt without anymore information it is IMPOSSIBLe to help you my friend....

the thing is i can't find any crash report any log there is no log file i have searched and i know where the log is even though i have searched every location there is no log the game just crash to desktop without any log or anything could this be because of ram i'm using a huge amount of mod 

i could only find this in debug file there is no log in Previous crash there was a crash report but there is nothing only this in

i know where the log is

I honestly doubt that. The game will always log unless you specifically tell it not to. So I would advice you to look at the sticky again because it is telling you where it should be:
